data.name: Devilian - Labyrinth Pack
data.detailed_description:
Don't get lost on your journey to defeat Kavel. This collection of devilish delights is sure to set you on the right path!

10-day Patron Access

Gain 25% more EXP, earn special daily rewards, access your Warehouse anywhere, and more!

25 Enigma Keys

Unlock Enigma Boxes and claim the treasures within

7-day Elara's Blessings

Earn 50% more XP and Devil Souls

7-day Bolton's Blessings

Earn 25% more Gold

data.short_description: Don't get lost on your journey to defeat Kavel. This collection of devilish delights is sure to set you on the right path!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GTX / AMD HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Glyph client and registered Trion Worlds account
